resources.string: How can we monitor and identify, in a scalable and real-time way, the defects in the pavement of the roads in Recife, bringing agility in directing these demands to the competent bodies? This is OurStreet. An application that shows you how are the streets and roads on which you intend to travel. The application works like this: When a user sees an occurrence (hole, work, etc.) he can report it by marking it on the map so that the next users can find out about it and if schedule in advance, diverting the route or leaving home earlier. That is, if you come across an occurrence, you can help everyone else by reporting. But not only other users who you can be helping, but also the city hall, which can access the application and find out at real time of what is happening to send a team to solve the problem, so everyone leaves winning.
